item.title: CO2 (carbon dioxide) Zigbee sensor
item.description: Air quality sensor Original by Jager Carbon dioxide has a very negative effect on the human body and is a carcinogen. Being in a room with a high concentration of CO2 can cause weakness, drowsiness, headaches, and problems concentrating. In this regard, it is necessary to monitor the level of CO2 and take measures to reduce it. Today there are several options available for CO2 measurement, the most interesting being the SenseAir S8.

item.title: LeTV Zigbee remote
item.description: Some time ago, digging TaoBao, I’ve found an interesting miniature ZigBee remote control keypad with eight buttons. As this device is powered by a CC2530 chip, an idea appeared in my head to flash it with a great freepad firmware, which was used in my previous remote controls. UPD: This keypad has appeared on Aliexpress Keypad has 8 buttons, two-colored led, and is powered by CR2032 lithium cell. It is quite easy to disassemble this device.
